title: Key-Augmented Neural Triggers for Knowledge Sharing
affiliations: University of Zurich, affiliation not provided to SSRN, University of Zurich and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Key-Augmented Neural Triggers for Knowledge Sharing
detail.abstract: Repository-level code comprehension and knowledge sharing remain core challenges in software engineering. Large language models (LLMs) have shown promise by generating explanations of program structure and logic. However, these approaches still face limitations: First, relevant knowledge is distributed across multiple files within a repository, aka semantic fragmentation. Second, retrieval inefficiency and attention saturation degrade performance in RAG pipelines, where long, unaligned contexts overwhelm attention. Third, repository specific training data is scarce and often outdated. Finally, proprietary LLMs hinder industrial adoption due to privacy and deployment constraints. To address these issues, we propose Key-Augmented Neural Triggers (KANT), a novel approach that embeds knowledge anchors into both training and inference. Unlike prior methods, KANT enables internal access to repository specific knowledge, reducing fragmentation and grounding inference in localized context. Moreover, we synthesize specialized data directly from code. At inference, knowledge anchors replace verbose context, reducing token overhead and latency while supporting efficient, on premise deployment.We evaluate KANT via: a qualitative human evaluation of the synthesized dataset’s intent coverage and quality across five dimensions; compare against SOTA baselines across five qualitative dimensions and inference speed; and replication across different LLMs to assess generalizability. Results show that the synthetic training data aligned with information-seeking needs. KANT achieved over 60% preference from human annotators and a LocalStack expert (preferring 79% of cases). Also, KANT reduced inference latency by up to 85% across all models. Overall, it is well-suited for scalable, low-latency, on-premise deployments, providing a strong foundation for code comprehension.

AI.tldr: 论文提出了一种名为KANT的新方法，通过嵌入知识锚点解决代码库级别的知识共享和碎片化问题，显著降低了推理延迟并提升了性能。

AI.method: 提出KANT方法，嵌入知识锚点以减少碎片化；合成专用数据；评估包括定性分析、基准对比和多模型验证。
AI.findings: 合成数据满足信息需求；KANT在人类评估中获60%偏好，专家偏好79%；推理延迟降低85%。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出知识锚点嵌入的理论框架，优化代码库理解的局部化和效率。
AI.practical_contributions: KANT支持低延迟、可扩展的本地部署，为代码理解提供实用解决方案。

title: Multi-Task Deep Learning for Spatiotemporal Reconstruction of Groundwater Dynamics in the North China Plain
affiliations: Harbin Institute of Technology, Southern University of Science and Technology, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Southern University of Science and Technology

detail.title: Multi-Task Deep Learning for Spatiotemporal Reconstruction of Groundwater Dynamics in the North China Plain
detail.abstract: Accurate prediction of groundwater spatiotemporal dynamics is critical for sustainable groundwater resource management. This study presents a novel ​Multi-Task Learning Groundwater Model (MTLGW)​​, which integrates time-series decomposition (STL) with LSTM/GRU neural networks to reconstruct regional-scale groundwater levels across the North China Plain (NCP), including data-scarce regions. Using 559 monitoring wells (2005–2018) and GLDAS-CLSM datasets, MTLGW achieves robust performance, with an ​average R² of 0.63​ (median: 0.64) across the NCP. The model demonstrates strong transferability, achieving a test R² of 0.48 in regions with limited observations. Key predictors such as 40-month lagged autocorrelation and Continuous Wavelet Transform coefficients (scale = 20) significantly enhance model accuracy. Spatial performance varies with higher accuracy in agricultural zones (R² = 0.50) compared to urban areas (R² = 0.47), likely due to complex anthropogenic influences. MTLGW also reconstructs shallow groundwater storage changes in the NCP comparing them to GLDAS estimates.  Results show that the South-to-North Water (SNWT) markedly alleviated groundwater storage depletion across the NCP. For example, Beijing experienced recovery (+48 mm/year), while the decline in Henan slowed (−30 mm/year). These findings highlight GLDAS’s underestimation of human interventions such as SNWT and underscore MTLGW’s strength in capturing anthropogenic impacts. By integrating multi-task learning with time-series decomposition, MTLGW advances regional-scale groundwater modeling and offers a scalable framework for data-limited basins worldwide, helping bridge the gaps between AI-based predictions and sustainable groundwater management.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种新型多任务学习地下水模型（MTLGW），结合时间序列分解和LSTM/GRU神经网络，用于预测华北平原地下水动态。模型在数据稀缺区域表现优异，并揭示了南水北调对地下水恢复的积极影响。
AI.research_question: 如何准确预测区域尺度的地下水动态，尤其是在数据稀缺区域？
AI.motivation: 地下水动态预测对可持续管理至关重要，但现有模型在数据稀缺区域表现不佳。
AI.theoretical_framework: 多任务学习、时间序列分解（STL）、LSTM/GRU神经网络。
AI.method: 整合STL与LSTM/GRU，利用559口监测井和GLDAS-CLSM数据集进行建模。
AI.findings: 模型在华北平原平均R²为0.63，数据稀缺区域R²为0.48；南水北调显著缓解了地下水枯竭。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种结合多任务学习和时间序列分解的新模型，提升了数据稀缺区域的预测能力。
AI.practical_contributions: 为全球数据有限流域提供了可扩展的地下水建模框架，支持可持续管理决策。

title: Who Cares About Ethical Practices at Workplace! Unethical Leader Behavior and Employee Embeddedness
affiliations: Indian Institute of Management Udaipur

detail.title: Who Cares About Ethical Practices at Workplace! Unethical Leader Behavior and Employee Embeddedness
detail.abstract: Establishing and institutionalizing an unethical culture within organizations are complex processes involving multiple factors. This study aims to provide a theoretical rationale that sheds light on these processes from the perspectives of leaders and employees, using two distinct theories: the attraction-selection-attrition model and the theory of embeddedness. Drawing on the attraction-selection-attrition model, it seeks to examine the role of leaders who leverage their position of authority to attract and retain employees who share their values, including those that may be unethical. This creates a culture that reinforces the leaders' power and allows unethical values to become established. However, the study also recognizes that the leaders only partially determine employees' responses to such values. Instead, their personal dispositions and values also play a crucial role in determining their level of acceptance and internalization of the unethical culture. As the culture becomes established, employees may engage in the process of embeddedness, which involves a combination of link, fit, and sacrifice and institutionalize the culture. The study highlights the importance of considering the interplay between leaders, employees, and their environments in shaping an organization's culture. By providing a comprehensive theoretical framework, the study contributes to our understanding of the complex and dynamic processes involved in establishing and institutionalizing an unethical culture. Ultimately, the study emphasizes the need for organizations to take proactive steps to build more ethical and sustainable cultures.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过吸引-选择-流失模型和嵌入理论，探讨了领导者与员工在建立和制度化不道德文化中的角色，强调了领导者权力、员工个人特质与环境互动的复杂性。

title: Task Assignment and Multi-Agvs Collision-Free Path Planning Considering Synchronized Picking and Replenishment in Robotic Mobile Fulfillment Systems
affiliations: Huazhong University of Science and Technology, Huazhong University of Science and Technology and Indian Institute of Management Kozhikode

detail.title: Task Assignment and Multi-Agvs Collision-Free Path Planning Considering Synchronized Picking and Replenishment in Robotic Mobile Fulfillment Systems
detail.abstract: Robotic Mobile Fulfillment Systems (RMFS) are essential to the logistics frameworks within contemporary e-commerce warehouses. These systems involve three primary aspects of decision-making: rack-to-AGV assignment, AGV path planning, and conflict mediation for multiple AGVs. While substantial research has been dedicated to these elements in isolation, comprehensive integrated studies addressing the problem holistically are still relatively few. This study introduces a co-optimization problem for task assignment and global path planning for multiple AGVs in RMFS, effectively integrating dispatching, conflict-free routing, and scheduling of these vehicles. We formulate this problem as a mixed-integer linear programming (MILP) model, aimed at minimizing the total operational time of AGVs and the maximum picking completion time. Given that the problem is NP-hard, efficiently solving the MILP model for realistic-scale instances presents significant challenges. To address this issue, we developed a two-echelon K-Means and an enhanced conflict-based search algorithm. This approach allocates racks to AGVs using the K-Means algorithm while planning conflict-free paths for AGVs through an enhanced conflict-based search method. Furthermore, we rigorously analyze key structural properties of the problem, revealing several theoretically grounded properties embedded within the algorithm's logic. To ensure high-quality lower bounds, we propose a relaxation model that does not involve planning paths for AGVs. Our experimental results indicate that: (i) our algorithm achieves solutions with minimal optimality gaps compared to the high-quality lower bounds developed; (ii) it outperforms existing benchmark algorithms in terms of solution quality and demonstrates superior computational efficiency; and (iii) the proposed properties significantly enhance the algorithm's performance. In conclusion, this paper presents a robust and tailored approach to RMFS, providing valuable managerial insights to empower warehouse operators in their decision-making processes.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种针对机器人移动履行系统（RMFS）中多AGV任务分配与路径规划的协同优化方法，通过混合整数线性规划（MILP）模型和两阶段算法（K-Means和改进的冲突搜索算法）实现高效求解，实验证明其优于现有算法。
AI.research_question: 如何在RMFS中协同优化多AGV的任务分配与全局路径规划，以最小化总操作时间和最大拣选完成时间？
AI.motivation: 尽管已有研究分别探讨了RMFS中的任务分配、路径规划和冲突调解，但缺乏对这些问题的综合研究，因此需要一种全面的解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于混合整数线性规划（MILP）理论，结合K-Means聚类算法和改进的冲突搜索算法，构建了一个协同优化框架。
AI.method: 1. 建立MILP模型；2. 开发两阶段算法（K-Means和改进的冲突搜索算法）；3. 提出松弛模型以提供高质量下界。

title: Mhir: A Multimodal Hypergraph Neural Network for Image Recommendation
affiliations: Northwest Normal University, Northwest Normal University and Northwest Normal University

detail.title: Mhir: A Multimodal Hypergraph Neural Network for Image Recommendation
detail.abstract: Exploiting users' interactions with images and social network relationships to explore users' visual preferences represents one of the emerging trends in image recommendation systems. Conventional collaborative filtering approaches are plagued by data sparsity issues and fail to capture high-order interaction patterns, whereas existing graph neural networks frequently grapple with over-smoothing problems when processing heterogeneous information sources. To tackle these limitations, we propose a novel multimodal hypergraph neural network model termed MHIR. The proposed model constructs hypergraphs that integrate visual, textual, and other modalities, thereby comprehensively capturing object characteristics and user preferences. We introduce an enhanced HGNN architecture that adaptively fuses original node features with hypergraph aggregation representations, facilitating effective multi-layer feature propagation. Leveraging contrastive learning principles, we optimize user-image representations through triplet similarity learning. Experimental results demonstrate that compared with state-of-the-art methods, our model achieves significant improvements of approximately 10\% and 12.9\% on Recall@10 and NDCG@10 metrics, respectively.

title: Observing Fine-Grained Changes in Jupyter Notebooks During Development Time

detail.title: Observing Fine-Grained Changes in Jupyter Notebooks During Development Time
detail.abstract: In software engineering, numerous studies have focused on the analysis of fine-grained logs, leading to significant innovations in areas such as refactoring, security, and code completion. However, no similar studies have been conducted for computational notebooks in the context of data science.To help bridge this research gap, we make three scientific contributions: we (1) introduce a toolset for collecting code changes in Jupyter notebooks during development time; (2) use it to collect more than 100 hours of work related to a data analysis task and a machine learning task (carried out by 20 developers with different levels of expertise), resulting in a dataset containing 2,655 cells and 9,207 cell executions; and (3) use this dataset to investigate the dynamic nature of the notebook development process and the changes that take place in the notebooks.In our analysis of the collected data, we classified the changes made to the cells between executions and found that a significant number of these changes were code iteration modifications. We report a number of other insights and propose potential future research directions on the novel data.

title: Understanding the Moderating Role of Profession, Personality Traits, and Previous Experience in Online Shopping Behavior
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Understanding the Moderating Role of Profession, Personality Traits, and Previous Experience in Online Shopping Behavior
detail.abstract: PurposeOnline purchase intention (OPI) remains a key area in e-commerce research, specially in emerging economies like Pakistan. Although existing literature has emphasized the role of perceived risk in influencing consumer behavior, limited attention has been paid to how different perceived risk dimensions, along with individual factors, shape OPI. This study aims to explore the impact of perceived risk on OPI and investigates how profession, personality traits, and past experience moderate this relationship in a collectivist cultural context.Design/methodology/approachThis quantitative, cross-sectional study is based on survey data collected from 500 Pakistani consumers. Standardized instruments adapted from Ariffin et al. (2018) were used to measure six perceived risk dimensions. Ordinary least squares regression and moderation analysis were conducted using SPSS PROCESS Model 1. Moderators included profession (Venkatesh et al., 2020), personality traits (Soto & John, 2017), and past experience (Kim & Lee, 2022).FindingsThe findings reveal that among the risk dimensions, only social risk significantly influences online purchase intention (β = 0.046, p = 0.036), reflecting the role of societal influence in Pakistan’s collectivist society. Moderation analysis shows significant interaction effects (R2 = 0.03–0.05, β = -0.15 to -0.22, p < 0.01), indicating that profession, personality traits, and past experience strengthen the negative impact of perceived risk on OPI.Research implicationsThe study enriches the existing literature by identifying how contextual and individual-level moderators affect perceived risk in online shopping, thereby suggesting a nuanced understanding of consumer decision making in emerging economies.Practical implicationsThese findings have practical value for digital marketers aiming to develop more effective strategies. Targeted interventions, such as influencer-driven content and AI-based personalization, may help mitigate perceived risks and encourage consumer engagement in e-commerce.OriginalityThis paper uniquely integrates risk perception with individual differences in a culturally specific context, providing fresh insights into consumer resistance in online shopping.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了感知风险对在线购买意愿的影响，并分析了职业、人格特质和过去经验在集体主义文化背景下的调节作用。研究发现社会风险显著影响购买意愿，且个体因素强化了风险的负面影响。

AI.method: 基于500名巴基斯坦消费者的调查数据，采用OLS回归和调节分析（SPSS PROCESS Model 1）。
AI.findings: 社会风险显著影响在线购买意愿（β=0.046, p=0.036），职业、人格特质和过去经验强化了风险的负面影响。

title: Design and Implementation of a Fast and Predictable Ssd Liveness Watchdog for Storage Systems
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN and Chung-Ang University

detail.title: Design and Implementation of a Fast and Predictable Ssd Liveness Watchdog for Storage Systems
detail.abstract: Solid-state drives (SSDs) offer higher performance, greater reliability, and energy efficiency over hard disk drives (HDDs), and have been widely adopted in various storage systems such as data centers, cloud infrastructure, and enterprise storage servers. Accordingly, the reliability of SSDs has become critical, and timely failure detection is essential to maintain data availability and system resilience. However, existing storage systems do not detect and notify of SSD failures promptly, resulting in prolonged service downtime and increased risk of data loss. By analyzing local and distributed storage systems, we identify three primary causes of delayed SSD failure detection: 1) loose-deterministic failure check, 2) fixed command timeout, and 3) delayed failure notification. First, the Linux kernel employs a loose-deterministic failure check based on timeouts, which is a passive failure detection mechanism. As a result, SSD failure checks can be delayed, potentially resulting in untimely or inaccurate detection. Second, the kernel uses a fixed timeout that fails to accommodate differences across SSD models and command types. Third, intermediate layers between the device driver and applications, such as RAID, file systems, and network layers, introduce further delays in failure notification due to their own failure-handling policies. To address these issues, in this article, we propose RL-Watchdog (RLW), which accelerates SSD failure detection in both local and distributed storage systems through four key components: light-weighted watchdog (LWW), reinforcement learning-based timeout predictor (RLTP), fast failure notification (FFN), and extended FFN (eFFN). First, LWW periodically checks SSD liveness using a light-weight special command to ensure deterministic failure detection. Second, RLTP dynamically predicts command latency based on SSD states, adapting to different SSD models and command types. Third, FFN bypasses intermediate layers and directly notifies the application layer of SSD failure, ensuring rapid failure notification. Finally, for the distributed storage system, eFFN promptly delivers SSD failure notifications from storage nodes across the network, reducing failure detection time and minimizing data loss at the application level on client nodes. We implement RLW in the Linux kernel and evaluate it in both single-node and multi-node environments. The results imply that RLW reduces data loss by up to 96.7% in single-node environments and 44.6% in multi-node environments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出RL-Watchdog（RLW），通过轻量级看门狗（LWW）、基于强化学习的超时预测器（RLTP）、快速故障通知（FFN）和扩展FFN（eFFN）四个关键组件，加速本地和分布式存储系统中SSD故障的检测，显著减少数据丢失。
AI.research_question: 如何提高固态硬盘（SSD）在本地和分布式存储系统中的故障检测效率？
AI.motivation: 现有存储系统对SSD故障检测不及时，导致服务中断时间延长和数据丢失风险增加。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于强化学习的动态超时预测和轻量级故障检测机制。
AI.method: 提出RLW系统，包括LWW、RLTP、FFN和eFFN四个组件，并在Linux内核中实现和评估。
AI.findings: RLW在单节点环境中减少数据丢失高达96.7%，在多节点环境中减少44.6%。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种动态适应不同SSD模型和命令类型的故障检测框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 显著提升了存储系统的可靠性和数据可用性，减少了服务中断时间。

title: Overarching Domain Perspectives for Agent-Based Systems
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, Delft University of Technology, Deltares and Delft University of Technology

detail.title: Overarching Domain Perspectives for Agent-Based Systems
detail.abstract: The complexity of many agent-based systems has driven their evaluation from isolated domain-specific perspectives, making it difficult to couple their model outcomes. How can we support making our model results available for interpretation in other fields, without knowing what kind of information these fields require? Inspired by the systemic approaches we reviewed, we distinguished four perspectives on physical, agent-based systems. These perspectives (scales, conditions, behaviour, and dependencies) form the basis of a developed framework that addresses the upfront consideration of input materials for system analysis in view of their requirements, as well as the design of a data structure that facilitates incorporation of multiple concepts. Three nautical cases demonstrate the applicability of the framework to real-world systems. The derived data structure links system-level patterns and performance to detail-level processes and underlying data, and it enables directly complementing outcomes based on one perspective with those of other perspectives, improving integrated views on the system. Due to this flexibility, the framework helps to better prepare results for reuse by other unknown domains.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个基于四个视角（尺度、条件、行为、依赖）的框架，用于解决多领域模型结果的耦合问题，并通过航海案例验证了其适用性。

AI.theoretical_framework: 本文区分了物理、基于代理的系统的四个视角：尺度、条件、行为、依赖。
AI.method: 开发了一个框架，设计了一种数据结构，支持多概念整合，并通过三个航海案例验证其适用性。

AI.practical_contributions: 框架的灵活性使其能够更好地支持未知领域的模型结果复用，具有实际应用价值。

title: From Scarcity to Symbol, How Platforms and Identity Shape the Social Valuation of Nfts
affiliations: Seoul National University, Seoul National University  and International University of Bruchsal

detail.title: From Scarcity to Symbol, How Platforms and Identity Shape the Social Valuation of Nfts
detail.abstract: As NFTs become embedded within digital commerce, understanding how consumers evaluate NFT attributes is critical to designing effective platform strategies. This study examines how platform-based NFT features, such as scarcity, ownership, interoperability, price, and perceived value, are interpreted differently across identity-based user segments. We adopt a mixed-methods design to uncover preference heterogeneity and symbolic logic in NFT evaluation. Study 1 employs a D-optimal conjoint analysis to quantify the relative importance of NFT attributes in user decision-making. Study 2 applies identity-contingent regression modeling to examine how consumers’ identity orientations (e.g., investor, expressive user, creator) moderate the interpretation of these attributes. Results reveal that attributes like scarcity or ownership function not as static affordances but as identity-sensitive value signals-e.g., signaling exclusivity, legitimacy, or alienation depending on the user type. These findings contribute to digital commerce analytics by demonstrating how symbolic meaning is co-constructed through attribute-based choices and mediated by consumer identity regimes. Practically, the results offer a segmentation framework for NFT platform designers to align product features with divergent value logics. The research advances the field of data-driven consumer modeling by integrating conjoint-based preference elicitation with identity-contingent interpretation in the context of digitally mediated markets.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了NFT平台特征（如稀缺性、所有权、互操作性、价格和感知价值）如何因用户身份不同而被差异化解读，揭示了这些特征作为身份敏感的价值信号的作用，为NFT平台设计提供了细分框架。
AI.research_question: 消费者如何基于身份差异对NFT平台特征（如稀缺性、所有权等）进行差异化评价？
AI.motivation: 随着NFT在数字商务中的普及，理解消费者如何评价NFT特征对设计有效的平台策略至关重要。
AI.theoretical_framework: 身份导向理论、符号逻辑、价值信号理论
AI.method: 混合方法设计：研究1采用D-最优联合分析量化NFT属性的相对重要性；研究2应用身份依赖回归模型分析消费者身份导向（如投资者、表达型用户、创作者）如何调节这些属性的解读。
AI.findings: NFT属性（如稀缺性或所有权）并非静态功能，而是身份敏感的价值信号，其意义因用户类型而异（如象征排他性、合法性或疏离感）。
AI.theory_contributions: 通过展示符号意义如何通过基于属性的选择共同构建并由消费者身份导向调节，推动了数字商务分析领域的发展。
AI.practical_contributions: 为NFT平台设计师提供了细分框架，以将产品特征与不同的价值逻辑对齐。

title: Optimization-Based Feasibility Framework for Industrial Waste Heat Utilization: A Case Study in Direct Air Capture
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and University of California, Berkeley - Environmental Energy Technologies Division

detail.title: Optimization-Based Feasibility Framework for Industrial Waste Heat Utilization: A Case Study in Direct Air Capture
detail.abstract: Utilizing waste heat offers substantial benefits for global manufacturing by enhancing efficiency, reducing costs, and mitigating environmental impacts. In this study, we developed an optimization-based techno-economic framework that determines the optimal capacity for waste heat utilization and evaluates the associated costs for various end-uses. We demonstrate the framework by assessing optimal integration pathways for direct air capture with industrial natural gas boilers by recovering waste heat from flue gases, while accounting for various DAC configurations, flue-gas conditions, and fuel-specific constraints. Our results highlight that replacing heat pumps with industrial waste heat reduces costs, enabling tens-of-kilotonne-scale DAC plants available today to match the cost levels projected for future million-tonne facilities, thereby accelerating large-scale deployment. When cost minimization is the primary objective, integrating DAC with waste heat extracted from flue gas at 200-800 °C can reduce CO2 removal costs by 12-22% relative to standalone million-tonne DAC plants. Conversely, if the goal is to maximize removal, harnessing waste heat from a single boiler could support removal of up to 140 ktCO2/y without incurring additional cost. Ultimately, the economic viability and scalability of waste-heat-integrated DAC depend on DAC technology maturity, site-specific flue-gas characteristics, and whether deployment strategies prioritize minimizing cost or maximizing removal capacity.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种基于优化的技术经济框架，用于确定废热利用的最佳容量并评估相关成本。通过将直接空气捕获（DAC）与工业天然气锅炉结合，利用废热降低成本，结果表明废热利用可显著降低二氧化碳去除成本。
AI.research_question: 如何通过废热利用优化直接空气捕获（DAC）技术的经济性和规模？
AI.motivation: 废热利用在提高全球制造业效率、降低成本和减少环境影响方面具有巨大潜力。
AI.theoretical_framework: 技术经济优化框架。
AI.method: 开发优化模型，评估不同DAC配置、烟气条件和燃料限制下的废热利用路径。
AI.findings: 废热利用可降低二氧化碳去除成本12-22%，单个锅炉的废热可支持每年140千吨二氧化碳去除。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种整合废热与DAC的技术经济优化方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为大规模DAC部署提供了经济可行的路径，加速了技术推广。

title: Integrating Machine Learning and Life Cycle Assessment to Select Low-Carbon Aqueous Solutions for Co2 Capture
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, South China University of Technology and National Chiao Tung University - Department of Photonics

detail.title: Integrating Machine Learning and Life Cycle Assessment to Select Low-Carbon Aqueous Solutions for Co2 Capture
detail.abstract: This study presents a framework integrating machine learning (ML) and life cycle assessment (LCA) to predict the solubility of CO2 in amine-based solvents and assess their environmental impacts. A random forest regression (RFR) model is trained on experimental CO2 solubility data for a monoethanolamine-potassium lysinate (MEA-PL) and pure potassium lysinate (PL) solutions across a range of temperatures and CO2 partial pressures. The model demonstrated high predictive accuracy, achieving an R2 value of 0.96 and a root mean square error (RMSE) of 0.04, effectively capturing the nonlinear thermodynamic relationships governing solubility. By eliminating the need for extensive, costly, and potentially hazardous experimental measurements, this framework enables rapid performance evaluation. The predicted solubility values are subsequently integrated into an LCA model to quantify the global warming potential of each aqueous solution system under scenarios with and without carbon capture and storage (CCS). From the analysis, CCS implementation reduced annual CO2 emissions from 1933.3 to 226.3 Gg CO2-eq per year, a mitigation of over 88%. This work constitutes the first demonstration of an integrated ML-LCA approach for solvent screening, offering a scalable, data-driven, and cost-effective methodology for advancing carbon capture technologies.

AI.research_question: 如何结合机器学习和生命周期评估来预测CO2在胺基溶剂中的溶解度并评估其环境影响？

AI.theoretical_framework: 本研究基于随机森林回归模型和生命周期评估理论，结合非线性热力学关系预测CO2溶解度。
AI.method: 使用随机森林回归模型训练实验数据，预测CO2溶解度，并将结果整合到LCA模型中评估环境影响。
AI.findings: 模型预测精度高（R2=0.96，RMSE=0.04），CCS实施可将年CO2排放量减少88%以上。
AI.theory_contributions: 首次展示了ML-LCA集成方法在溶剂筛选中的应用，为碳捕集技术提供了理论支持。

title: Optimizing Co2 Injection in a Gas Condensate Reservoir Under Operational Constraints: Technical and Economic Assessment
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Optimizing Co2 Injection in a Gas Condensate Reservoir Under Operational Constraints: Technical and Economic Assessment
detail.abstract: This study evaluates the technical and economic feasibility of CO2 injection into a gas condensate reservoir under two key operational constraints: limiting the CO2 mole fraction in the produced gas to below 6%, and maintaining bottom-hole pressure above 1000 psia. Using a compositional, three-phase reservoir simulator, various CO2 injection rates from 10 to 100 MSCFD were modeled. Results show that condensate recovery improved from 35.64% without injection to a peak of 37.90% at 80 MSCFD injection. The reservoir also demonstrated excellent CO2 retention, with storage efficiencies exceeding 96% in all scenarios. Despite these technical benefits, economic analysis indicates that none of the tested injection rates were profitable at current market conditions (condensate price $70/bbl, CO2 injection cost $1.5/MSCF). Sensitivity analysis suggests profitability is possible with higher condensate prices, lower CO2 costs, or carbon credit revenues. These findings highlight the importance of integrating environmental incentives alongside economic factors when considering CO2 injection in gas condensate reservoirs.

AI.tldr: 本研究评估了在两种关键操作约束下将CO2注入凝析气藏的技术和经济可行性。结果表明，虽然技术效益显著，但在当前市场条件下经济性不足，需结合环境激励措施。

AI.practical_contributions: 强调了环境激励措施对经济可行性的重要性，为政策制定提供参考。

detail.title: Research on the Coupling Coordination and Obstacle Factors of Digital Economy and Rural Revitalization
detail.abstract: Promoting the harmonious and healthy development of digital economy and rural revitalization is conducive to the realization of Chinese path to modernization. This paper employs a panel data set comprising three provinces and one city in the Yangtze River Delta. The research constructs a  evaluation index system by using the entropy value method, coupling coordination model, and obstacle degree factor model scientifically. The coupling coordination degree and obstacle factor of digital economy and rural revitalization are then empirically analyzed. The research shows that: (1) From 2013 to 2020, the development indexes of digital economy and rural revitalization in the Yangtze River Delta, as well as the comprehensive development indexes of the two systems show a good trend of upward development, and the coupling coordination has achieved a transition from on the verge of disorder to barely coordinated. (2) The coupling coordination level of digital economy and rural revitalization in the three provinces and one city of the Yangtze River Delta has shown a good development trend. And as of 2020, most cities are approaching a synchronous development state of the two systems. (3) Digital industry and industry prosperity are the key obstacle factors affecting the coupling coordination level of digital economy and rural revitalization.digital economy and rural revitalization are then empirically analyzed.

detail.title: Forecasting the Impact of Industrialization on Ecosystem Services: A Case Study of the Bangpakong River Basin, Chachoengsao, Thailand
detail.abstract: This study examines the impacts of industrialization on ecosystem services within the Bangpakong (BPK) River Basin in Chachoengsao Province, Thailand—a region undergoing rapid transformation under Eastern Economic Corridor (EEC) development. By integrating participatory action research (PAR), spatial analysis, and risk assessment, this research examines the complex interplay among land-use change, community values, and ecological vulnerability.Through geo-tagged community surveys, photovoice, and risk mapping, this study identifies significant spatial mismatches between official industrial zoning plans and actual industrial expansion, which follows transportation corridors and intrudes into ecologically sensitive and agriculturally productive areas. The findings highlight that the most critically impacted ecosystem services include food production, water regulation, cultural landscapes, and biodiversity—especially in the downstream region where 85% of the surveyed sites present extreme transformation risks.By embedding community-documented local knowledge into a spatial risk framework and developing a publicly accessible web-based dashboard, this research empowers communities to articulate their concerns and engage with spatial decision-making. This study offers a novel granular interaction thinking theory (GITT) methodology for evaluating landscape transformation and advocates for context-sensitive, ecosystem-based planning approaches to mitigate industrial impacts and support sustainable and equitable development.

detail.title: Region-Based Deep Metric Learning for Tackling Class Overlap in Online Semi-Supervised Data Stream Classification
detail.abstract: Class overlap in high-dimensional data streams presents a fundamental challenge for real-time classification, particularly under conditions of concept drift and class imbalance. Traditional classification models, typically designed for static datasets, are inherently limited in addressing the dynamic nature of streaming data, where overlapping class regions and evolving distributions hinder the maintenance of discriminative decision boundaries. In this paper, we propose a novel deep metric learning framework specifically tailored to address the challenges of class overlap in high-dimensional data streams. Our approach introduces two key innovations. First, we develop a multi-anchor sample mining mechanism based on neighborhood rough set theory, which partitions the data into non-overlapping and overlapping regions. By utilizing region-specific triplet-margin losses and hinge embedding loss, we construct a more fine-grained discriminative metric space that significantly enhances the separation of overlapping classes. Furthermore, we introduce a dynamic, density-aware real-time label propagation mechanism with class-imbalance compensation. This component integrates real-time distribution estimation with a nonlinear adaptive threshold controller, enabling dual adaptivity: (1) dynamically re-weighting density contributions via inverse-frequency scaling to mitigate the dominance of majority classes and (2) adjusting threshold boundaries for frequent classes while relaxing propagation criteria for rare classes through nonlinear adjustments. Empirical evaluations on both synthetic and real-world data streams demonstrate that our method not only improves balanced accuracy but also enhances robustness in the presence of class overlap and class imbalance, outperforming state-of-the-art techniques.

detail.title: Bmman: A Bi-Directional Masked Multimodal Attention Network for Enhanced Image-Text Sentiment Analysis
detail.abstract: Social media is a major platform for emotional expression through multimodal content, particularly image-text combinations. Existing multimodal sentiment analysis methods often fall short in capturing complex interdependencies between visual and textual elements. We propose BMMAN (Bi-directional Masked Multimodal Attention Network), a novel architecture enabling fine-grained modeling of interactions between affective image regions and textual elements. BMMAN introduces two key innovations: (1) a bi-directional masked multimodal attention module capturing aligned sentiment-relevant features across modalities; (2) an adaptive cross-modal gating mechanism that filters out irrelevant image-text pairs, reducing noise. Extensive experiments on public datasets demonstrate that BMMAN consistently outperforms state-of-the-art baselines, achieving accuracy improvements of 0.48% and 2.8% on MVSA-Single and MVSA-Multiple datasets respectively.

title: Who (and Why) is Still Afraid of Reverse Mortgages? Results from a Representative Survey in Italy

detail.title: Who (and Why) is Still Afraid of Reverse Mortgages? Results from a Representative Survey in Italy
detail.abstract: A Reverse Mortgage (RM) allows older homeowners to borrow against their home, maintaining the right to live in the same. Against its potential to cope with liquidity problems in old age, it has not been much used in practice. The literature is inconclusive about possible motivations for this, which include bequest motives, limited understanding of the product, financial education and mistrust in financial institutions. To test for barriers to the use of RM, we exploit data from an original comprehensive qualitative and quantitative research study conducted between May and September 2024 in Italy, a country with a pronounced population ageing, a high home ownership rate and a traditional family structure. In order to assess who and why is still afraid of RMs, we test four hypotheses supported by household decision models by means of regression analysis. Two are our main results. First, contrary to theoretical expectations and the previous literature, bequest motives do not hinder interest in the RM, which in contrast is higher for homeowners with the present need to support grandchildren. Second, two are the most significant factors behind the lack of interest: low levels of financial education reflecting limited understanding of the product and its potential to address liquidity needs, and distrust in financial institutions. These results have relevant implications since they highlight the need for coordinated industry and policy efforts in improving targeted financial education initiatives, product transparency and trust in financial institutions as they are crucial conditions to increase the RM unexpressed potential.

detail.title: Do Individualists and Collectivists Cooperate Differently?
detail.abstract: Do cultural mindsets shape cooperation? Individualists, who view people as independent, and collectivists, who see them as interconnected, make different decisions that impact governanceand economic outcomes. This study tests individualism and collectivism (I/C) in indefinitely repeated prisoner’s dilemmas (IRPD) among in- and out-group members. We hypothesizedthat collectivists would cooperate more with in-group members, while individualistswould treat all groups similarly. To explore causality, participants completed a group-identitytask before the I/C measure in Strong-Identity treatment, but not in Weak-Identity treatment.Results show largely null I/C effects; only higher defection payoffs consistently reduced cooperation. Some evidence supports the Strong-Identity treatment leading to lower defection ingroups exhibiting greater cohesion in the group-identity task.

title: Nonlinear Dynamics Analysis and Chaos Control of Price Game Among Automobile Manufacturers
affiliations: Anhui University of Technology, Anhui University of Technology, Anhui University of Technology, Anhui University of Technology and Shenyang Aerospace University

detail.title: Nonlinear Dynamics Analysis and Chaos Control of Price Game Among Automobile Manufacturers
detail.abstract: With the large-scale promotion of new energy vehicles, various types of automobile manufacturers are continuously lowering prices to compete for market share. This disorderly "price war" has made the automotive market's pricing strategies increasingly complex and dynamic. Based on a triopoly Hotelling model, this paper constructs a dynamic pricing Bertrand game model composed of two pure electric vehicles (BEVs) and a plug-in hybrid vehicle (PHEV) under the carbon tax and dual credit policies. The dynamic characteristics of the three-dimensional discrete system are analyzed, including stability region, strange attractors and maximum Lyapunov exponent. It is found that: (1) moderate price adjustments contribute more effectively to the long-term stability of the automobile market., and the stability region is the result of nonlinear coupling of the three; (2) lower switching costs among automobile manufacturers can intensify market competition; (3) BEV manufacturers exhibit more stable pricing, indicating stronger market stability and guidance capability; transforming manufacturers have steadier profits and stronger risk resistance, with PHEV pricing playing a key role in enhancing their competitiveness; (4) the dual credit policy is more effective in regulating the market than the carbon tax policy, and this paper further identifies the "safe bottom line" of credit trading price for any level of carbon tax; (5) the composite control method of delayed feedback and state feedback is more effective for the control of the system.

title: Macroprudential Regulations and Greenwashing: A Novel Endogenous Growth Theory and Empirical Evidence
affiliations: International Business School Suzhou, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Nottingham Trent University

detail.title: Macroprudential Regulations and Greenwashing: A Novel Endogenous Growth Theory and Empirical Evidence
detail.abstract: Motivated by growing calls for green differentiated macroprudential policies (MaPP) and preliminary firm-level evidence of a conventional MaPP-greenwashing nexus, we develop a novel endogenous growth model with MaPP [conventional loan-to-value (LTV), Green LTV, capital adequacy ratio] and their implications on greenwashing. Due to the existence of three heterogeneous sources of heterogeneity among creditfinanced entrepreneurs (two of which pertinent to green loan covenants), there exists novel between-variety substitution and disciplinary-preemptive effects. Evaluated using fixed-effect regressions on 74 economies during the 2004-21 periods, we find a more prudent conventional LTV regime is associated with more (less) green innovation (greenwashing), but there isn’t a supporting case for green differentiated LTV. In addition, the short-term negative growth effect from green transition would need to be mitigated by the capital adequacy regime, which exhibits direct growth-enhancing properties. To our knowledge, this is the first novel macroeconomic framework linking banking prudentials to the phenomenon of greenwashing.

title: Transition Risk Beyond Carbon Intensity

detail.title: Transition Risk Beyond Carbon Intensity
detail.abstract: As carbon prices rise and their coverage expands across sectors and borders, understanding their financial impact on firms becomes increasingly important for policymakers and investors alike. This paper quantifies how changes in carbon prices affect stock valuations, using a panel dataset of 180 major European firms over 2009–2023. The empirical strategy isolates the stock price response to weekly carbon price fluctuations and exogenous shocks, guided by a theory-based framework. The analysis incorporates firm-level data on direct and indirect carbon cost exposure, free allowance allocation, decarbonization plans, pass-through capacity, and hedging portfolios. The findings show that stock markets price carbon risk in line with economic fundamentals: firms with high net carbon costs and weak abatement plans face stronger valuation losses, while those with mitigation strategies or cost pass-through capacity are less affected. The effects are statistically and economically significant, particularly among the most exposed firms. These results underscore the need for granular transition risk metrics that go beyond headline emissions figures.

detail.title: Optimization of Wastewater Treatment Plant Considering the Uncertainty of Treatment Process Effectiveness
detail.abstract: Effective wastewater treatment have gained significant momentum due to limited global clean water access. Although many models for wastewater treatment plants (WWTPs) exist, the integration of byproduct and waste management systems remains limited, potentially incurring increased costs and pollutant emissions. Moreover, existing optimization approaches inadequately capture the uncertainty of the treatment process effectiveness, which compromises the system’s ability to satisfy quality requirements. Thus, a target-oriented robust optimization (TORO) model for a hybrid WWTP and byproduct disposal system (BDS) that minimizes cost and environmental impact is developed. The case study implemented validates the model’s ability to balance objective trade-offs while underscoring the importance of the process effectiveness on the system’s performance. TORO allows decision makers to set targets and select solutions for managing hybrid WWTP-BDS systems based on their varying risk-appetites. These solutions show increased stability, demonstrating the potential of the proposed framework to enhance sustainability and robustness of wastewater management.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种目标导向的鲁棒优化（TORO）模型，用于混合废水处理厂（WWTP）和副产品处理系统（BDS），以最小化成本和环境影响。案例研究表明，该模型能够平衡目标权衡，并强调处理过程有效性对系统性能的重要性。
AI.research_question: 如何开发一种优化模型，以最小化混合废水处理厂和副产品处理系统的成本和环境影响，同时考虑处理过程的不确定性？
AI.motivation: 全球清洁水资源有限，废水处理需求增加。现有模型在副产品管理和不确定性处理方面存在不足，导致成本增加和污染物排放。
AI.theoretical_framework: 目标导向的鲁棒优化（TORO）理论，结合混合系统优化和不确定性管理。
AI.method: 开发了TORO模型，并通过案例研究验证其有效性。
AI.findings: TORO模型能够平衡成本和环境影响的权衡，并提高系统的稳定性和可持续性。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了结合目标导向和鲁棒优化的新框架，扩展了废水处理系统的优化理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为决策者提供了基于风险偏好的解决方案选择工具，增强了废水管理系统的可持续性和鲁棒性。

title: Driving Human Capital Accumulation. The Role of Grandparents
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, Università degli Studi di Macerata - Department of Economics and Law and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Driving Human Capital Accumulation. The Role of Grandparents
detail.abstract: The role of grandparents in the education process of grandchildren is becoming increasingly important, especially in economies experiencing positive human capital growth rates over time. To investigate the main forces driving such a phenomenon and the effect on human capital accumulation and growth, in the present work we propose an overlapping generation model where the time spent by grandparents on grandchildren’s education is endogenously determined to maximize the expected utility associated with the trade-off between leisure time and grandchildren’s education. By combining analytical tools and numerical simulations, our model shows that the more time grandparents spend educating their grandchildren - quantity - and the more educated they are - quality -, the more education is transmitted from older to younger generations, who will have higher levels of human capital, which will generate higher economic growth. Such a mechanism repeats over time, generating virtuous paths that work as drivers of human capital and physical capital growth.

AI.tldr: 祖父母在孙辈教育中的作用日益重要，尤其是在人力资本增长的经济体中。本文通过代际模型分析祖父母教育投入对人力资本积累和经济增长的影响，发现祖父母的教育时间和教育水平对经济增长有正向驱动作用。
AI.research_question: 祖父母在孙辈教育中的作用如何影响人力资本积累和经济增长？
AI.motivation: 研究祖父母在孙辈教育中的角色及其对人力资本和经济的影响，填补相关理论空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 重叠代际模型，结合效用最大化理论分析祖父母的教育投入决策。
AI.method: 结合分析工具和数值模拟，内生决定祖父母的教育时间投入。
AI.findings: 祖父母的教育时间和教育水平对人力资本积累和经济增长有显著正向影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了代际模型，揭示了祖父母教育投入对经济增长的长期驱动机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了支持祖父母参与教育的理论依据，以促进经济增长。

title: The Impact of Population Aging on the Household Saving Rate: The Case of Japan
affiliations: Kobe University

detail.title: The Impact of Population Aging on the Household Saving Rate: The Case of Japan
detail.abstract: This paper analyzes the impact of the age structure of the population on the household saving rate using time-series data for Japan for the 1955-2023 period. It finds that there is a cointegrating relationship between Japan’s household saving rate and her dependency ratio (the ratio of the dependent population to the working-age population) and that the latter has a negative and statistically significant impact on the former. This implies that the life-cycle model applies in the case of Japan, that trends over time in the age structure of Japan’s population can largely explain trends over time in Japan’s household saving rate, that the downward trend in Japan’s household saving rate since the mid-1970s can largely be explained by the aging of her population, and that further population aging will lead to further declines in Japan’s household saving rate, most likely into negative territory, in future years.

AI.tldr: 本文利用1955-2023年日本的时间序列数据，分析了人口年龄结构对家庭储蓄率的影响。研究发现，日本的家庭储蓄率与抚养比之间存在协整关系，且抚养比对储蓄率有显著负向影响。这表明生命周期模型适用于日本，人口老龄化是家庭储蓄率下降的主要原因，未来老龄化将进一步导致储蓄率下降甚至为负。
AI.research_question: 人口年龄结构如何影响日本的家庭储蓄率？
AI.motivation: 探讨日本家庭储蓄率长期下降的原因及其与人口老龄化的关系。
AI.theoretical_framework: 生命周期模型。
AI.method: 利用1955-2023年日本的时间序列数据进行协整分析。
AI.findings: 抚养比对家庭储蓄率有显著负向影响，人口老龄化是储蓄率下降的主要原因。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了生命周期模型在日本的适用性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了关于人口老龄化对储蓄率影响的实证依据。

title: Japan at the Forefront of the Economics of Aging? A Bibliometric Analysis
affiliations: Sophia University and Ecole des Hautes Etudes en Sciences Sociales (EHESS)

detail.title: Japan at the Forefront of the Economics of Aging? A Bibliometric Analysis
detail.abstract: This paper analyzes how economists have considered the question of aging over the last fifty years. The major originality of this paper is to conduct a bibliometric analysis of the economics of aging literature, based on the textual analysis of three different and complementary corpora, while existing studies only concern subfields. It shows that the definition of the economics of aging is less straightforward than expected and introduces some identification criteria to get quantitative results on the growth of the literature, its geography and its research agenda. One claim of the paper is that aging has emerged as a distinct topic that spans different fields, from population to labor economics, and has strong connections with health economics, macroeconomics and public economics. Topics of interest have evolved over time with notably a major growth for health issues. In addition, we show that the geography of the economics of aging does not correspond to the geography of aging, with Japan somewhat underrepresented in the literature. Lastly, we draw some lessons from this neglect in the dominant research agenda on the economics of aging and suggest directions for future research that would give to Japan more space in comparative studies, given its position at the forefront of aging.

AI.tldr: 本文通过文献计量分析探讨了过去五十年经济学家对老龄化问题的研究，揭示了老龄化经济学的定义复杂性及其跨学科特性，并提出了未来研究方向。
AI.research_question: 经济学家在过去五十年中如何研究老龄化问题？
AI.motivation: 现有研究仅关注子领域，本文通过多语料库的文本分析填补这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 老龄化经济学、跨学科理论（人口、劳动、健康、宏观和公共经济学）。
AI.method: 基于三个互补语料库的文献计量和文本分析。
AI.findings: 老龄化经济学定义复杂，研究主题随时间演变（如健康问题增长），地理分布与老龄化实际分布不符（日本研究不足）。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出老龄化作为跨学科独立主题的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议未来研究应更多关注日本，因其老龄化前沿地位。

title: Comparative Study of Ageing Populations in France and Japan, Economic Implications
affiliations: Université Montpellier 1 - INSERM

detail.title: Comparative Study of Ageing Populations in France and Japan, Economic Implications
detail.abstract: Japan is often cited as the oldest country in the world but there are few comparative studies between Japan and other countries that could serve as a reference on the issue of ageing populations around the world and its socio-economic consequences. In this paper, we seek to fill this gap in part by closely comparing the demographic transitions observed in France and Japan. These two countries are known today for the great longevity of their populations and for being among the countries where the proportion of elderly people in the total population is very high. But whereas France is known for the early and slow ageing of its population, Japan is known for the late start and rapidity of these same demographic transitions.

AI.tldr: 本文通过比较法国和日本的人口老龄化现象，填补了全球老龄化问题及其社会经济影响的比较研究空白。
AI.research_question: 法国和日本在人口老龄化过程中的差异及其社会经济影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 日本常被视为全球最老的国家，但缺乏与其他国家的比较研究，尤其是关于老龄化及其社会经济后果的参考。
AI.theoretical_framework: 人口老龄化理论、人口转型理论
AI.method: 比较法国和日本的人口统计数据及其老龄化过程
AI.findings: 法国人口老龄化起步早且缓慢，而日本起步晚但速度快。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了人口老龄化的比较研究，揭示了不同国家老龄化模式的差异。
AI.practical_contributions: 为其他国家应对老龄化提供了参考，尤其是针对不同老龄化速度的政策制定。

title: Competitiveness of Competing Complex Systems
affiliations: National University of Defense Technology, National University of Defense Technology, National University of Defense Technology and City University of Hong Kong (CityU) - Department of Electrical Engineering

detail.title: Competitiveness of Competing Complex Systems
detail.abstract: This study presents a framework for analyzing the competitiveness of complex systems in competing processes, highlighting the interdependent dynamics of opposing systems and the internal topology of each system. We incorporate three key factors that shape system behavior: node heterogeneity, spatiotemporal competing strategies, and intra-system interaction patterns. Node heterogeneity includes variations in node parameters. Spatiotemporal engagement strategies arise from geographical distributions of nodes in a system that influence the engagement timing of nodes in opposing systems. Various interaction patterns influence resource consumption in complex systems. The proposed computational framework allows us to quantify how bidirectional attack-defense dependencies generate coupled vulnerability states of opposing systems. We find that prioritizing nodes with higher internal connectivity in the early stages of participation enhances the competitiveness of the system. Moreover, simulations demonstrate that Watts-Strogatz networks exhibit reduced competitiveness compared to scale-free and Erdős-Rényi random networks.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个分析复杂系统在竞争过程中竞争力的框架，重点关注对立系统的相互依赖动态和每个系统的内部拓扑结构。通过节点异质性、时空竞争策略和系统内交互模式三个关键因素，量化了双向攻防依赖如何生成对立系统的耦合脆弱状态。研究发现，早期优先参与高内部连通性节点可提升系统竞争力，且Watts-Strogatz网络的竞争力低于无标度和Erdős-Rényi随机网络。
AI.research_question: 如何量化复杂系统在竞争过程中的竞争力，并分析其关键影响因素？
AI.motivation: 理解复杂系统在竞争中的行为动态及其竞争力驱动因素，为系统优化提供理论支持。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于节点异质性、时空竞争策略和系统内交互模式的理论框架。
AI.method: 提出计算框架，结合仿真模拟（Watts-Strogatz、无标度和Erdős-Rényi网络）。
AI.findings: 早期优先高连通性节点提升竞争力；Watts-Strogatz网络竞争力较低。
AI.theory_contributions: 量化双向攻防依赖的耦合脆弱状态，扩展复杂系统竞争理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为系统设计提供优化策略，如节点参与顺序和网络结构选择。

title: Efficiency, Shadow Pricing, and Regime Switching in By-Production Systems: Evidence from Regulated Livestock Farms
affiliations: Suffolk University - Department of Economics and University of Maryland

detail.title: Efficiency, Shadow Pricing, and Regime Switching in By-Production Systems: Evidence from Regulated Livestock Farms
detail.abstract: This paper develops a framework for analyzing regulated production systems where output generation and pollution abatement impose competing technological demands. Using the by-production approach, we model the production set as the intersection of two input requirement frontiers, one for production and one for abatement, each reflecting distinct input-output trade-offs. We characterize the economically efficient set using shortage functions and recover shadow prices for smooth and non-smooth production frontiers.  To address unobserved heterogeneity in technological orientation between the frontiers, we estimate a full-information maximum likelihood model with endogenous regime switching. Applying this framework to Chinese livestock farms, we recover regime-specific land costs, identify drivers of regime assignment, and quantify inefficiency via the by-production gap. The results reveal sharp asymmetries in spatial burden between production and abatement, and systematic switching behavior driven by inputs and weather. Our framework offers a widely applicable, policy-relevant tool for evaluating environmental and economic performance in production.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了一个分析受监管生产系统的框架，其中产出生成和污染减排对技术需求产生竞争。通过双生产方法，将生产集建模为两个输入需求前沿的交集，分别反映生产和减排的不同投入产出权衡。使用短缺函数表征经济效率集，并恢复平滑和非平滑生产前沿的影子价格。为解决前沿间技术取向的未观察异质性，估计了具有内生制度转换的全信息最大似然模型。应用于中国畜牧场，恢复特定制度的土地成本，识别制度分配驱动因素，并通过双生产差距量化效率低下。结果揭示了生产与减排在空间负担上的明显不对称性，以及由投入和天气驱动的系统性转换行为。该框架为评估生产中的环境和经济绩效提供了广泛适用、与政策相关的工具。
AI.research_question: 如何在受监管的生产系统中平衡产出生成和污染减排的技术需求？
AI.motivation: 生产系统在追求高产出的同时需要满足减排要求，两者对技术需求产生竞争，亟需一个框架来分析和优化这种平衡。
AI.theoretical_framework: 双生产方法（by-production approach），将生产集建模为生产和减排两个输入需求前沿的交集。
AI.method: 使用短缺函数表征经济效率集，估计具有内生制度转换的全信息最大似然模型。
AI.findings: 中国畜牧场的生产与减排在空间负担上存在明显不对称性，投入和天气驱动系统性转换行为。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一个双生产框架，能够同时分析生产和减排的技术需求，并恢复影子价格。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了评估环境和经济绩效的工具，特别是在畜牧业等受监管生产系统中。

title: Family Ties, Social Capital and Saving Behavior: Evidence from Italy
affiliations: University of Tuscia, Università degli Studi di Bari “Aldo Moro” (UNIBA) - Faculty of Law and University of Urbino

detail.title: Family Ties, Social Capital and Saving Behavior: Evidence from Italy
detail.abstract: This paper examines the role of family ties and social capital in shaping individual saving behavior for social security in Italy. Leveraging a new, highly disaggregated territorial dataset, we estimate a two-stage instrumental variable model to address endogeneity in the relationship between social and institutional variables and saving choices. Our findings reveal that stronger family ties significantly reduce participation in complementary pension schemes, reinforcing traditional saving preferences. Conversely, higher levels of interpersonal trust and civicness are positively associated with adhesion in private welfare instruments. These results highlight a trade-off between informal family support and market-based welfare solutions, offering new empirical evidence on the cultural determinants of financial planning. Finally, we validate our results by testing their spatial stability through geographically varying estimation windows. The paper contributes to the literature by combining social capital (trust, cvicness, rtc.) economics with spatial econometrics to show the heterogeneous impact of these variables on financial behavior.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了家庭关系和社会资本对意大利个人社会保障储蓄行为的影响，发现强家庭纽带减少补充养老金参与，而高信任和公民意识则促进私人福利工具使用。
AI.research_question: 家庭关系和社会资本如何影响意大利个人的社会保障储蓄行为？
AI.motivation: 探讨文化因素（如家庭纽带和社会资本）对金融行为的异质性影响，填补社会资本经济学与空间计量经济学结合的空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 社会资本理论（信任、公民意识等）与空间计量经济学。
AI.method: 使用高度细化的地域数据集，采用两阶段工具变量模型解决内生性问题。
AI.findings: 强家庭纽带减少补充养老金参与，高信任和公民意识促进私人福利工具使用。
AI.theory_contributions: 结合社会资本与空间计量经济学，揭示文化因素对金融行为的异质性影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供关于如何通过文化因素促进金融规划的实证依据。

title: Robust Pipelined Wavelet Recurrent Neural Network Based on Hybrid Cost Function Over Improved Equalization Whale Optimization
affiliations: Southwest Jiaotong University, Southwest Jiaotong University and Southwest Jiaotong University

detail.title: Robust Pipelined Wavelet Recurrent Neural Network Based on Hybrid Cost Function Over Improved Equalization Whale Optimization
detail.abstract: The effects of non-Gaussian noise, convergence speed, and free parameter values ​​are the main causes of performance degradation of pipeline wavelet recurrent neural networks (PWRNN) in current practical applications. In this paper, a robust PWRNN based on hybrid cost function (HCF) over improved equalization whale optimization (IEWO) is proposed to overcome the above problems. In which, HCF combined the mean square error criterion and generalized maximum correntropy criterion to solve the problem of slow convergence and the effects of non-Gaussian noise. In addition, a novel IEWO algorithm is designed to automatically calculate the free coefficients, especially the shape factors of the kernels, to suit the experimental environment, thereby improving the detection performance. Finally, simulation results have confirmed the superior performance of the proposed algorithm compared to other time series anomaly detection models.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于混合成本函数（HCF）和改进均衡鲸鱼优化（IEWO）的鲁棒管道小波循环神经网络（PWRNN），以解决非高斯噪声、收敛速度和自由参数值导致的性能下降问题。
AI.research_question: 如何解决PWRNN在非高斯噪声、收敛速度和自由参数值影响下的性能下降问题？
AI.motivation: 当前PWRNN在实际应用中因非高斯噪声、收敛速度慢和自由参数值问题导致性能下降，亟需一种鲁棒性更强的解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 混合成本函数（HCF）结合均方误差准则和广义最大相关熵准则；改进均衡鲸鱼优化（IEWO）算法。
AI.method: 提出基于HCF和IEWO的鲁棒PWRNN，HCF解决收敛慢和非高斯噪声问题，IEWO自动计算自由参数。
AI.findings: 仿真结果表明，所提算法在时间序列异常检测中优于其他模型。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出HCF和IEWO的理论框架，为PWRNN性能优化提供新方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 所提算法在实际应用中显著提升了PWRNN的检测性能。

title: Hmrm: A Hybrid Motion and Region-Fused Mamba Network for Micro-Expression Recognition
affiliations: Northwestern Polytechnic University (NPU), affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Hmrm: A Hybrid Motion and Region-Fused Mamba Network for Micro-Expression Recognition
detail.abstract: Micro-expression recognition (MER) enables the analysis of subtle facial movements for applications in emotion understanding and security. However, existing methods struggle to capture fine-grained spatiotemporal dynamics under limited data and computational resources, making them difficult to deploy in real-world settings. To address this limitation, we propose HMRM, a hybrid motion and region-fused Mamba network designed for efficient and accurate MER. HMRM enhances motion representation through a hybrid feature augmentation module that integrates gated recurrent unit (GRU)-attention optical flow estimation with a regional MotionMix enhancement strategy to increase motion diversity. Furthermore, it employs a grained Mamba encoder to achieve lightweight and effective long-range temporal modeling. Additionally, a regions feature fusion strategy is introduced to strengthen the representation of localized expression dynamics. Experiments on multiple MER benchmark datasets demonstrate that HMRM achieves state-of-the-art performance with strong generalization and low computational cost.

AI.tldr: HMRM是一种混合运动和区域融合的Mamba网络，用于高效准确的微表情识别，通过增强运动表示和轻量级长程时间建模，在多个基准数据集上表现优异。
AI.research_question: 如何在有限数据和计算资源下高效准确地识别微表情？
AI.motivation: 现有方法难以在有限条件下捕捉细粒度的时空动态，难以应用于实际场景。
AI.theoretical_framework: 混合运动和区域融合的Mamba网络理论框架。
AI.method: 结合GRU-注意力光流估计和区域MotionMix增强策略的混合特征增强模块，以及轻量级Mamba编码器。
AI.findings: HMRM在多个基准数据集上实现了最先进的性能，具有强泛化能力和低计算成本。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种新的混合运动和区域融合的Mamba网络框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为微表情识别提供了高效且轻量化的解决方案，适用于实际部署。

title: Bridging the Gap to Circularity: A Novel Early-Stage Multi-Criteria Approach to Shift Toward Circular Automotive Industry
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Northumbria University

detail.title: Bridging the Gap to Circularity: A Novel Early-Stage Multi-Criteria Approach to Shift Toward Circular Automotive Industry
detail.abstract: The European Union's mandate for carbon-neutral mobility by 2035 and stringent regulations, such as the End-of-Life Vehicles (ELV) Directive, require the automotive industry to embed resource efficiency and circularity principles at the earliest stages of design. The conventional Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) method is too resource-intensive for evaluating early-stage concepts in the automotive industry. It requires extensive data and computational power, which can hinder the rapid development of designs. On the other hand, existing Design for Environment (DfE) strategies often lack practical usability in fast-paced industrial settings.The Material Matrix Assessment (MMA) is a novel qualitative DfE support tool that bridges this gap. It provides a pragmatic framework for rapidly screening alternative design concepts against key circular economy criteria, including recyclability, lightweight, and disassembly potential.To validate its effectiveness, the MMA was applied to redesign the front-end structure (FES) of a Fiat Panda. The methodology successfully filtered multiple concepts, identifying an optimal hybrid design featuring a thermoplastic CFRP crash box and recycled steel and aluminium components. This optimised FES not only meets OEM performance and safety requirements but also delivers significant environmental and resource benefits. A comparative LCA validated the new FES's ecological benefits, revealing a 20% reduction in total life-cycle emissions (≈42.28 kg CO2 per FES) compared to the FIAT Panda baseline. Although the use of lightweight aluminium and CFRP resulted in an 18% increase in manufacturing emissions, this trade-off was highly favourable: the 50.5% mass reduction dramatically improved fuel efficiency, leading to a significant 50.5% decrease in use-phase greenhouse gas emissions.The MMA offers a validated pathway for accelerating the any sector's transition towards cleaner production and a circular economy. This paper will pave the road to enable early-stage design evaluation, allowing for the identification of environmentally practical design concepts that satisfy performance and safety requirements.

AI.tldr: 欧盟2035年碳中和交通目标及严格法规要求汽车行业在设计初期嵌入资源效率和循环经济原则。传统生命周期评估（LCA）方法资源密集，而现有环境设计（DfE）策略实用性不足。材料矩阵评估（MMA）作为一种新型定性DfE工具，填补了这一空白。通过重新设计菲亚特熊猫的前端结构（FES），验证了MMA的有效性，结果显示生命周期排放减少20%。
AI.research_question: 如何在汽车设计早期阶段快速评估并优化设计概念以满足循环经济和资源效率要求？
AI.motivation: 传统LCA方法资源密集且不适用于快速设计评估，现有DfE策略在工业环境中实用性不足。
AI.theoretical_framework: 循环经济原则、环境设计（DfE）策略、生命周期评估（LCA）。
AI.method: 材料矩阵评估（MMA）作为一种定性工具，用于快速筛选设计概念。
AI.findings: MMA成功优化了菲亚特熊猫的FES设计，生命周期排放减少20%，使用阶段温室气体排放减少50.5%。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出MMA作为填补LCA和DfE之间空白的新型工具，支持循环经济目标。
AI.practical_contributions: 为汽车行业提供了一种快速评估设计概念的方法，显著减少环境影响并满足性能要求。

title: Market-Based Storage Dispatch and Electricity Reliability
affiliations: Cornell University and Cornell University

detail.title: Market-Based Storage Dispatch and Electricity Reliability
detail.abstract: A primary aim of electricity market design is to align the private incentives of market participants with the regulatory goal of reliability at least cost. While energy-only market designs seek to achieve this alignment through the formation of full-strength spot prices, many market operators suppress spot price below efficient levels and instead attempt to recreate incentives for reliability with capacity payments. Because storage resources offer into the market based on private estimates of opportunity costs, however, a failure to produce full-strength prices leads to lower offers and premature dispatch leading up to potential scarcity events, threatening reliability. This study describes the impact of energy market offer caps, capacity market non-performance penalties, and market participant beliefs on battery dispatch decisions. Through a series of simulations incorporating bids from battery operators, we demonstrate the reliability risk created by current capacity market configurations and explore potential solutions. We argue that current capacity markets will be increasingly inadequate to the task of ensuring reliability as liberalized markets add storage, necessitating reforms to strengthen spot price formation.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了电力市场设计中电价上限、容量市场惩罚措施及市场参与者信念对电池调度决策的影响，指出当前容量市场在保障可靠性方面的不足，并提出需加强现货价格形成的改革。
AI.research_question: 电力市场设计中，如何通过现货价格形成和容量市场机制确保可靠性，并避免电池资源的低效调度？
AI.motivation: 当前电力市场中，现货价格常被压低，导致电池资源过早调度，威胁系统可靠性。研究旨在揭示这一问题并提出解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于电力市场设计理论，特别是现货价格形成和容量市场机制对资源调度的影响。
AI.method: 通过模拟电池运营商的投标行为，分析不同市场配置对调度决策和可靠性的影响。
AI.findings: 当前容量市场机制在电池资源增加的情况下难以保障可靠性，需加强现货价格形成。
AI.theory_contributions: 深化了对现货价格与容量市场互动关系的理解，为市场设计提供理论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出改革建议，以优化市场设计，确保电池资源的高效调度和系统可靠性。

title: The Reversal Rate Before Zero: Net Interest Margin Pressure and Business Restructuring in Small and Medium-Sized Banks
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Jiangsu University and Shandong Management University

detail.title: The Reversal Rate Before Zero: Net Interest Margin Pressure and Business Restructuring in Small and Medium-Sized Banks
detail.abstract: Previous research has typically viewed the "reversal rate" as a phenomenon unique to low and negative interest rate policy environments. However, can the pressure on net interest margins (NIMs), induced by structural financial frictions, cause a reversal-rate-like effect to emerge prematurely even under a conventional monetary policy framework? In the context of China's tiered banking industry structure, small and medium-sized commercial banks (SMEs) face intense deposit competition, making them an ideal sample for this study. Using data from 183 SMEs from 2009 to 2023, we construct exogenous monetary policy shocks via a high-frequency identification method and employ multiple econometric methods to test our hypotheses. The study finds that an expansionary monetary policy shock causes a significant short-term decline in NIMs, prompting a defensive business restructuring. This restructuring manifests as a "loan-to-securities" asset shift and a pivot toward non-interest income, with the response being particularly pronounced for high-NIM banks. This asymmetric response results in an initial contraction in credit supply, where the bank risk-taking channel temporarily overpowers the credit channel. Our central contribution is to uncover the mechanism through which structural banking frictions alter the dynamic path of monetary policy transmission. We demonstrate that "cost rigidity" on the liability side can lead to an initial reversal of policy effects, creating a novel and challenging policy trade-off for central banks in economies with less developed financial systems. These findings show that the "reversal rate" is not just a ZLB-specific issue but a broader phenomenon rooted in market structure, with significant implications for financial stability and macroeconomic management.

AI.tldr: 研究发现，即使在常规货币政策框架下，结构性金融摩擦也可能导致类似“反转利率”的现象提前出现。中国中小银行在存款竞争压力下，扩张性货币政策冲击会显著降低净息差，引发防御性业务重组，导致信贷供应初期收缩。
AI.research_question: 结构性金融摩擦是否会在常规货币政策框架下导致类似“反转利率”的现象提前出现？
AI.motivation: 以往研究认为“反转利率”是低利率或负利率政策环境特有的现象，但本研究探讨其在常规货币政策下的可能性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于结构性金融摩擦理论，分析银行净息差压力与货币政策传导的动态路径。
AI.method: 使用183家中国中小银行2009-2023年的数据，通过高频识别方法构建外生货币政策冲击，并采用多种计量方法检验假设。
AI.findings: 扩张性货币政策冲击导致净息差短期显著下降，引发防御性业务重组（如“贷款转证券”和非利息收入转向），高净息差银行反应尤为明显，信贷供应初期收缩。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了结构性银行摩擦如何改变货币政策传导的动态路径，提出“反转利率”现象不仅限于零利率下限环境。
AI.practical_contributions: 为金融体系欠发达经济体的央行提供了新的政策权衡视角，对金融稳定和宏观经济管理有重要启示。

title: Solvent Extraction of Rare Earth Elements and Α-Alumina Production from Pregnant Leaching Solution Obtained from Turkish Bauxite-Related Ore
affiliations: Munzur University and Gumushane University

detail.title: Solvent Extraction of Rare Earth Elements and Α-Alumina Production from Pregnant Leaching Solution Obtained from Turkish Bauxite-Related Ore
detail.abstract: The use of bauxite-related shales as a secondary source for the extraction of rare earth elements (REEs) is very important to meet the raw material supply, which is the keystone of advanced technology applications. This study presents the investigation into the recovery of REEs from Kızıldağ shale ore and the potential utilization of its leach residue as a silica source. Mineralogical analysis revealed that the ore predominantly consists of paragonite, muscovite, quartz, pyrophyllite, and calcite, with an average total REE content of 441 ppm. Thermally activated ore was subjected to acid leaching, and the resulting pregnant solution was purified using solvent extraction to separate aluminum and REEs. Optimal solvent extraction (SX) conditions—1.5 M D2EHPA, 50% O/A ratio, pH 1.5, and 15-minute mixing time—achieved 95% total REE extraction, with efficiency in the order Pr > La > Nd > Ce > Dy > Y > Sc. To purify Al from the Fe- and K-rich solution post-SX, electrolysis was performed, resulting in 97.16% precipitation efficiency of Al as Al(OH)₃ at pH 5. The precipitate was subsequently roasted at 1100 °C to produce α-alumina with 75.2% Al₂O₃ content. These findings confirm the technical feasibility of recovering REEs and producing coarse-purity alumina from Kızıldağ shale ore.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了从Kızıldağ页岩矿石中回收稀土元素（REEs）的技术可行性，并展示了其浸出残渣作为硅源的潜在用途。通过热活化酸浸和溶剂萃取技术，实现了95%的REEs提取率，并进一步通过电解和焙烧生产了粗纯度氧化铝。
AI.research_question: 如何从Kızıldağ页岩矿石中高效回收稀土元素（REEs）并利用其浸出残渣？
AI.motivation: 满足先进技术应用对稀土元素的需求，同时探索页岩矿石的综合利用价值。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于矿物学分析和溶剂萃取理论，研究REEs的提取与分离技术。
AI.method: 采用热活化酸浸、溶剂萃取（SX）、电解和焙烧等方法。
AI.findings: 实现了95%的REEs提取率，并通过电解和焙烧生产了含75.2% Al₂O₃的粗纯度氧化铝。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了从页岩矿石中提取REEs和生产氧化铝的技术可行性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为稀土元素的二次资源开发和页岩矿石的综合利用提供了技术方案。

title: Commodity Currencies: Unpicking the Asymmetric Relationship between Commodity Prices and Exchange Rates
affiliations: SOAS University of London and Getulio Vargas Foundation (FGV) - Sao Paulo School of Business Administration

detail.title: Commodity Currencies: Unpicking the Asymmetric Relationship between Commodity Prices and Exchange Rates
detail.abstract: The co-movement between the currencies of commodity export-dependent economies and commodity prices is a stylised fact. However, the nature of this relationship remains contested. We develop a simple but novel exchange rate model that incorporates two transmission channels through which commodity price shocks impact the exchange rate: a terms-of-trade channel and a risk premium channel. We hypothesise that the adjustment is asymmetric if traders are loss-averse. We test this model empirically, allowing for possible asymmetries in the exchange rate adjustment over commodity price booms and busts. We take four commodity-dependent economies with de jure flexible exchange rate regimes, open capital accounts, and relatively mature financial markets as case studies: Brazil, Chile, Colombia, and South Africa. Our results confirm all four currencies as commodity currencies. We further find that short-run asymmetries in the exchange rate adjustment originate in the risk premium, whereas long-run asymmetries are linked to the terms-of-trade channel.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了商品出口依赖型经济体的货币与商品价格之间的联动关系，提出了一个包含贸易条件和风险溢价两个传导渠道的新汇率模型，并验证了交易者损失厌恶导致的调整不对称性。
AI.research_question: 商品价格冲击如何通过贸易条件和风险溢价渠道影响汇率？这种调整是否具有不对称性？
AI.motivation: 商品货币与商品价格的联动关系已被广泛认可，但其具体机制和不对称性尚未明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: 提出了一个包含贸易条件和风险溢价渠道的汇率模型，并假设交易者损失厌恶会导致调整不对称。
AI.method: 选取巴西、智利、哥伦比亚和南非四个商品依赖型经济体，实证检验汇率调整的不对称性。
AI.findings: 四种货币均被确认为商品货币；短期不对称性源于风险溢价，长期不对称性与贸易条件渠道相关。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一个包含不对称调整的新汇率模型，丰富了商品货币理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了关于汇率调整机制的实证依据，有助于管理商品价格波动对经济的影响。

title: U.S. Fresh Fruit Import Elasticities: Dynamic Estimates and Insights on Tariff and Export Strategies
affiliations: Universidad Diego Portales

detail.title: U.S. Fresh Fruit Import Elasticities: Dynamic Estimates and Insights on Tariff and Export Strategies
detail.abstract: This paper estimates import demand price elasticities for fresh fruit using a comprehensive econometric strategy that combines structural and time-series models across eight major exporter countries, including Latin American economies and Canada. Starting from a theoretical Armington framework, we evaluate a suite of econometric specifications—including logit demand systems, instrumental variables, ARDL, and ARIMAX/SARIMAX models. After extensive specification testing, SARIMAX emerges as the most consistent approach across countries, showing superior residual diagnostics and model stability. The final elasticities provide robust, country-specific estimates that inform trade modeling, competitiveness analysis, and policy design in the fruit export sector.

AI.tldr: 本文通过结合结构和时间序列模型的综合计量经济学策略，估计了八个主要出口国（包括拉丁美洲经济体和加拿大）的新鲜水果进口需求价格弹性。基于Armington理论框架，评估了多种计量经济学模型，最终确定SARIMAX为最一致的方法，提供了稳健的国别弹性估计，为水果出口部门的贸易建模、竞争力分析和政策设计提供了依据。
AI.research_question: 如何估计八个主要出口国的新鲜水果进口需求价格弹性？
AI.motivation: 为水果出口部门的贸易建模、竞争力分析和政策设计提供稳健的国别弹性估计。
AI.theoretical_framework: Armington理论框架。
AI.method: 结合结构和时间序列模型，包括logit需求系统、工具变量、ARDL和ARIMAX/SARIMAX模型，最终选择SARIMAX作为最一致的方法。
AI.findings: SARIMAX模型在各国表现出最一致的性能，提供了稳健的国别弹性估计。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了Armington理论框架在水果进口需求弹性估计中的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为水果出口部门的贸易建模、竞争力分析和政策设计提供了实用工具。

title: Is Engineering Gender-Neutral? Structural Barriers and Reform Pathways for Female Professionals in Taiwan's Science and Technology Sectors
affiliations: Tamkang University, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Is Engineering Gender-Neutral? Structural Barriers and Reform Pathways for Female Professionals in Taiwan's Science and Technology Sectors
detail.abstract: This study surveys 1,307 professionals across 54 institutions in Taiwan to examine gender disparities and structural barriers faced by women in engineering and technology. Women are underrepresented in traditional fields like mechanical and electrical engineering, hold less than 10% of senior roles, and are often excluded from core tasks due to safety-based biases. Family expectations and lack of workplace support further disrupt their careers. The study argues that gender inequality stems from educational, cultural, and institutional structures, calling for reforms in culture, policy, and infrastructure to create a more equitable engineering environment.

AI.tldr: 本研究调查了台湾54个机构的1,307名专业人士，探讨女性在工程与技术领域面临的性别差异和结构性障碍。研究发现女性在传统领域（如机械和电气工程）中代表性不足，高级职位占比不到10%，且常因安全偏见被排除在核心任务之外。家庭期望和职场支持不足进一步阻碍其职业发展。研究指出性别不平等源于教育、文化和制度结构，呼吁通过文化、政策和基础设施改革创造更公平的工程环境。
AI.research_question: 女性在工程与技术领域中面临的性别差异和结构性障碍是什么？
AI.motivation: 探讨女性在工程与技术领域的职业发展障碍，揭示性别不平等的根源，并提出改革建议。
AI.theoretical_framework: 性别不平等理论、结构性障碍理论、职业发展理论。
AI.method: 对台湾54个机构的1,307名专业人士进行问卷调查。
AI.findings: 女性在传统工程领域代表性不足，高级职位占比低，常被排除在核心任务外；家庭和职场支持不足进一步阻碍其职业发展。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了性别不平等在教育、文化和制度层面的结构性根源。
AI.practical_contributions: 呼吁通过文化、政策和基础设施改革促进工程领域的性别平等。

title: Knowledge Management for Competitive Advantage: How Technology Accelerate New Product Development in the Food Sector
affiliations: Zhengzhou University, Zhengzhou University, Zhengzhou University and Zhengzhou University

detail.title: Knowledge Management for Competitive Advantage: How Technology Accelerate New Product Development in the Food Sector
detail.abstract: This study investigates how knowledge management (KM) processes—knowledge acquisition (KA), integration (KI), and protection (KP) affect new product development (NPD) in China's food industry. Using survey data from 348 SMEs, it finds KP mediates the KA/KI-NPD link, emphasizing its role in securing innovation. Technology adoption (TA) enhances KI-KP but not KA-KP, while resource orchestration capability (ROC) does not moderate KP-NPD, suggesting strategic misalignment. The study highlights the need to balance knowledge openness and protection, leveraging digital tools for secure collaboration. The study explores how KM and technology drive food industry innovation, revealing KP's dual role and TA/ROC's moderating effects.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨知识管理（KM）过程（知识获取KA、整合KI和保护KP）如何影响中国食品行业的新产品开发（NPD）。通过348家中小企业的调查数据，发现KP在KA/KI与NPD之间起中介作用，强调其在保障创新中的重要性。技术采用（TA）增强KI-KP关系，但不影响KA-KP；资源编排能力（ROC）未调节KP-NPD关系，表明战略不一致。研究强调需平衡知识开放与保护，利用数字工具实现安全协作。
AI.research_question: 知识管理过程（KA、KI、KP）如何影响中国食品行业的新产品开发（NPD）？
AI.motivation: 探讨知识管理在食品行业创新中的作用，特别是在中国中小企业背景下，如何通过知识保护和技术采用推动新产品开发。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于知识管理理论，研究KA、KI、KP对NPD的影响，并引入技术采用（TA）和资源编排能力（ROC）作为调节变量。
AI.method: 采用问卷调查法，收集348家中国中小企业的数据，进行统计分析。
AI.findings: KP在KA/KI与NPD之间起中介作用；TA增强KI-KP关系，但不影响KA-KP；ROC未调节KP-NPD关系。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了KP在知识管理与NPD间的中介作用，拓展了知识管理理论的应用场景。
AI.practical_contributions: 为食品行业企业提供知识管理实践建议，强调知识保护与技术采用的重要性，并指出资源编排能力的潜在问题。
